tool_description: An API showing all the lastest COVID-19 In Vancouver
name: COVID-19 Live
title: COVID-19 Live

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source News
api_list.description: Gets News about Climate Change from a specific news resource.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://covid-19-live2.p.rapidapi.com/news/dailyhive"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "covid-19-live2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://covid-19-live2.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All COVID-19 News
